text: Sarah Louise Green (born 25 April 1982) is a British businesswoman and Liberal Democrat politician. She has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for Chesham and Amersham since 2021. Green is the first Liberal Democrat to represent the area. ==References== Category:1982 births Category:Living people Category:UK MPs 2019â€“2024 Category:Welsh politicians Category:Liberal Democrats (UK) MPs Category:Members of the British House of Commons for English constituencies
title: Sarah Green (politician)
